word:
My brethren, will you use the talent of speech in earnest persuasion to lead our people to see the importance of the work? We must arouse the zeal and earnestness of the canvassing agents, calling on them to take the light into the dark places of the earth. There is no release for any who have talents and capabilities. They are required to be the Lord's instruments, 


                                    -356- 

required to cooperate with the Lord Jesus in shedding the light of heaven into this sin-darkened world.
